author: sussman
msg: * STATUS:  nominate two memory bugs for backport.

author: brane
msg: * build.conf: Remove the never-used __INSTALLER__ MSVC target.

author: sussman
msg: The public API claims that we return a UTF8 string, but
apr_strftime isn't actually giving us that.  Fix by forcibly

author: xsteve
msg: - fixed some typos, mostly missing dots at the end of documentation
sentences and a few cases of arguments not capitalized in docstrings.
- most uses of "actual" were changed to "current"

author: cmpilato
msg: Fix the default commit log for repos-to-repos moves.
(repos_to_repos_copy): If this is move, then show the deletion in
the commit log default text, too.
